lead_paragraph: The passengers, testifying at the trial of the bus driver charged in a 2011 crash on Interstate 95 that killed 15 passengers, gave details of the wreck.
snippet: The passengers, testifying at the trial of the bus driver charged in a 2011 crash on Interstate 95 that killed 15 passengers, gave details of the wreck....

headline.print_headline: 2 Who Rode Casino Bus Tell of Crash
headline.main: 2 Who Rode Casino Bus Tell of Crash
headline.seo: Passengers of Casino Bus in Deadly I-95 Crash Testify Against Driver

abstract: Passengers on World Wide Tours bus involved in a 2011 crash on Interstate 95 in the Bronx that killed 15 people testify at the trial of driver, Ophadell Williams, charged with manslaughter and negligent homicide.
